name: Rock Paper ...Turrets
description:
Rock, Paper ...Turrets is a short puzzle platformer, where you need to swap between characters and use their different properties to get them all to the finish. This game was created as a Weekly Game Jam #154 project. Controls:

Movement using A, D and SPACE.

Swap between characters using 1, 2 and 3.

Reload level using the reload button in the top left corner or reload to last swap using the flag button right next to it.
